name: video_search_api
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool petey_vid_video_search_api.
Tool description: Access Petey Vid search engine, search over 600 million videos from 70+ platform providers
API description: Performs a search on the Petey Vid index using specified parameters and the Petey Vid Video Search API.

q.description: The query string for the search (e.g., keywords or phrases).

dur.description: The duration filter for the search (e.g., 'short', 'medium', 'long'). Defaults to None.

sort.description: The sort order for the search results (e.g., 'relevance', 'date'). Defaults to None.

media.description: The media filter for the search results, typically indicating media type (default is 'Y'). Defaults to 'Y'.
